restricted payments.title: LIMITATIONS ON DIVIDENDS AND DISTRIBUTIONS
restricted payments.text:
LIMITATIONS ON DIVIDENDS AND DISTRIBUTIONS
No Restricted Payments are permitted unless the Consolidated Net Leverage Ratio is less than 3.00 to
1.00 and no Default exists immediately before and after giving effect thereto.

change of control.title: CHANGE-IN-CONTROL PROVISION
change of control.text:
CHANGE-IN-CONTROL PROVISION
If there is a change in control of the Borrower, the Borrower shall make an offer to repurchase the
Notes at 101% of principal plus accrued interest.
